data.text: @beojji23 You may select the Senior Citizen option under the Passenger tab on our website/mobile app. Please note that the passenger must be booked separately from full paying adults. Kindly adjust your settings on Twitter so we can send you a direct message. Thank you.
@HecDavidJr Thank you for your kind words, Hector! We are glad to have you on board! ✈

@jmbascooo Hi, Jerome. We're truly sorry about this. Please know we will not disrupt flights if it was not deemed necessary for passenger safety or for operational requirements. Thank you for understanding. :(
@artlovesdef We have sent you a DM. Thank you.
@Obog1996 Hi, Jimboy. We suggest to include this in your check-in baggage. However, please note that all items are subject to final assessment at the airport. Thank you.
@Erwin90770517 We are sorry for the inconvenience, Erwin. We sent you a DM. Please check your inbox.

@beojji23 Once the ticket has been purchased, we regret but we don't offer discount refund. :(

For more information, kindly refer to this link: https://t.co/AzJyxchJVT
@beojji23 Hi, May we know the flight route? Please know that senior citizen discounts are only applicable for domestic flights. Thank you.

@johnsy123aus We regret to learn of your disappointment, Stephen. We have already forwarded this to the concerned office for their attention. Thank you for raising this matter. We hope to be of better service to you on your future travels.

urls.title: Travel during COVID
urls.description: Travel requirements are subject to change at short notice by the issuing government authority. As such, posting of the advisories below is not real-time and serve only as a guide. Please confirm your requirements directly with the offices/websites of your place of origin and destination. All passengers are encouraged to follow the guide, register in advance and pre-book their hotels as necessary to avoid any inconvenience and experience faster processing upon arrival. Per PAL’s Conditions of Carriage,

urls.title: Prepaid baggage
urls.description: No need to worry about your travel essentials! Save more versus excess fees at the airport. Check-in smoothly at the airport. Rates are per sector and vary per destination. Please refer to the rates and guidelines below. PH – Hong Kong or v.v. USD 45 PH – Port Moresby or v.v. USD 65 PH – Sydney/Melbourne or v.v. USD 95 PH – Tel Aviv or v.v. USD 165 PH – Singapore or v.v. USD 45 PH – Phnom Penh or v.v. USD 45 PH – Hong Kong or v.v. HKD 380 PH – Shanghai or v.v. CNY 320 PH – Denpasar or v.v. IDR 630000 PH

•Be placed in a secure and leak-proof container
•Have valid vaccination certificates and exit and/or entry permits

If there are changes with your flight schedule, you should receive a notification through your registered contact detail on the booking.

@jjlyte Thank you for letting us know that you have received your baggage, Julyos. We apologize for the inconvenience. We have noted your feedback. We believe listening to our passengers is the best way for us to learn and improve our services. Thank you.

@_IamHeather_ (22in x 14in x 9in) and maximum weight of 7 kgs. (15 lbs).

In case your carry-on bag exceeds the allowed weight or dimension, it may be intercepted as a checked baggage and charged applicable Excess Baggage Charges (EBC).

Thank you.

(2/2)

@_IamHeather_ Hello, Heather. Please be informed that each passenger is allowed one piece of carry-on baggage small enough to be placed in the overhead bin or under the passenger seat of the aircraft cabin with a maximum total dimension of 56cm x 36cm x 23cm

urls.title: Fill | myPAL Request Hub
urls.description: Booking requests at your fingertips. The myPAL Request Hub provides passengers with convenient servicing options. Through this secure online form, you can request the following transactions wherever you are: • Rebook due to schedule change, travel restrictions, or cancellations • Convert your Ticket to a Travel Credit • Request for refund • Follow-up on an existing request You can use this online facility in 3 easy steps: 1. Fill out the form 2. Click SUBMIT 3. Receive a confirmation via email Important Reminders: • For more information on your booking change options, visit https://bit.ly/PALPassengerOptions page. • For tickets issued by our partner travel agents, requests on booking changes must be made through your issuing travel agent. • myPAL Request Hub can assist requests for changes to confirmed bookings on Philippine Airlines flights which were made through the PAL Website, PAL Mobile App, PAL Ticket Offices, or PAL’s Reservations Hotline.
